Fees and adoption procedures Tips
Twila
Cat ● Senior ● Male ● M
Rococo
Cat ● Adult ● Female ● M

Foster an animal

Do you like animals, but are unable to commit to one long term? By fostering, you can temporarily offer shelter and care to an animal in need!

Cohabit peacefully with wildlife

Learn how to avoid conflicts with wildlife – such as coyotes, skunks, raccoons and company –  and find out how to help them… the right way!

Lost and found animals

Have you lost or found an animal? First, check if the Montreal SPCA serves your municipality or borough.

Adopt an animal

See all our little protégés waiting for their furever homes and learn more about our adoption procedures and fees. Your new companion may be just a click away!

CONTACT US

Montreal, Quebec
